title: Fix 'Access Admin Portal' button to navigate to external Admin Portal URL

requirements.text: Update the Landing page so that clicking the "Access Admin Portal" button navigates the user to the external URL https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ (full page navigation in the same tab), instead of routing to the internal "/admin/signin" route.

quotes: Not required just fix navigation Once hit "Access Admin Portal " Navigate to https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page, clicking "Access Admin Portal" performs a full page navigation to https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ in the same tab.
The app does not navigate to /admin/signin when "Access Admin Portal" is clicked.
Customer Portal navigation ("Access Customer Portal" -> /customer/signin) continues to work as before.
Works on mobile browsers as well as desktop browsers.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths) must not be modified.
Keep backend as single-actor; no backend changes are required for this navigation fix.
nonGoals: Do not change any admin authentication/authorization behavior or backend access control logic.
Do not redesign the landing page UI beyond what is necessary to fix the Admin Portal navigation.
